title: A Matter of Belief
description: In the city of Tressia, the last vestiges of Lumestran belief have been all but supplanted by the worship of Sidara, Lady of Light. However, change is not welcomed by all and, when a prominent Sidarist is found murdered, suspicion falls upon the outlawed remnants of the Lumestran faith. It falls upon Sergeant Erika Nierev to catch the killer before the Sidarists take matters into their own hands. But Tressia is a city of secrets â€“ secrets that will not be easily brought out into the light...
author: Matthew      Ward
